text:
Sint-Amands is a former municipality in the Belgian province of Antwerp. It includes the towns of Lippelo, Oppuurs and Sint-Amands proper. On 1 January 2019, Puurs and Sint-Amands were merged into the new municipality of Puurs-Sint-Amands.
In 2007, 7819 people lived there.
It is at 51° 03 North, 04° 12 East.
